attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we bought a kitten, whom we love dearly.The home he came from was disgusting,we had to get him away from there.It soon became clear he was ill, he had been bred with an enlarged heart,3 leaky heart valves, too small pelvis, causing bowel problems. This has cost us £1000 approx.We have tried to stop this person breeding and selling the poor kittens, know one is interested.This is cruelty at its worst. we love our kitten and he has the best specialist care possible.It should never happen.
